title: Ankit Gupta, Mandar Vaidya move on from Oyo
description: "We are proud of their achievements at Oyo and are thankful for their leadership. Both roles were already transitioned six months ago to Varun Jain, COO India, and, Gautam Swaroop, CEO, Oyo Vacation Homes, respectively," an Oyo spokesperson said
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
